analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/2/0x7865af71cf0b288b4e7f654f4f7851eb46a2b7f8.sol:
	Contract Sentivate has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/2/0x7865af71cf0b288b4e7f654f4f7851eb46a2b7f8.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x7865af71cf0b288b4e7f654f4f7851eb46a2b7f8.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/2/0x7865af71cf0b288b4e7f654f4f7851eb46a2b7f8.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x7865af71cf0b288b4e7f654f4f7851eb46a2b7f8.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
